text: "Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous" is the first single off American pop punk band Good Charlotte's second studio album, The Young and the Hopeless. The song was released in September 6, 2002. On the Billboard charts, the song was able to peak at #20 on the Hot 100 and #6 on the Top 40 Mainstream. In 2003, the song won a MTV Video Music Award for "Viewer's Choice". It was also the winner of a Kerrang! Award for Best Single. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2002 songs Category:Good Charlotte songs
title: Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous (song)
